name: BestWorkplaces
0:
”Alexa, ask best workplaces for a company”
”Alexa, ask best workplaces to tell me something”
”Alexa, ask best workplaces for a best workplace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best workplaces
des: This skill is created to tell user a company from a list of best places to work in technology. User can ask something like, "Alexa, ask best places to work for a company". The skill will respond to user with a company name in the list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
